testInfo.name: Тест по предлогам английского языка
testInfo.description: Тест на знание предлогов времени, места и движения

questions.question: Choose the correct preposition: I'll see you ___ Friday.
Which preposition is used for months?
Fill in the blank: The meeting starts ___ 9 o'clock.
Choose the correct preposition: The book is ___ the table.
Fill in the blank: She lives ___ London.
Fill in the blank: We're going ___ the cinema tonight.
Choose the correct preposition: She is good ___ mathematics.
Fill in the blank: I'm interested ___ learning languages.
Which preposition is used for specific addresses?
Fill in the blank: Look ___ this beautiful picture!
Choose the correct preposition: He arrived ___ the airport.
Fill in the blank: She was born ___ 1990.
Which preposition is used for surfaces?
Fill in the blank: The cat jumped ___ the wall.
